verses.verse: Thus the heavens <WH8064> and the earth <WH776> were finished <WH3615> <WH8792>, and all the host of them <WH6635>.

And on the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> 'Elohim <WH430> ended <WH3615> <WH8762> his work <WH4399> which he had made <WH6213> <WH8804>; and he rested <WH7673> <WH8799> on the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> from all his work <WH4399> which he had made <WH6213> <WH8804>.

And 'Elohim <WH430> blessed <WH1288> <WH8762> the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117>, and sanctified <WH6942> <WH8762> it: because <WH3588> that in it he had rested <WH7673> <WH8804> from all his work <WH4399> which 'Elohim <WH430> created <WH1254> <WH8804> and made <WH6213> <WH8800>.

These <WH428> are the generations <WH8435> of the heavens <WH8064> and of the earth <WH776> when they were created <WH1254> <WH8736>, in the day <WH3117> that the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> made <WH6213> <WH8800> the earth <WH776> and the heavens <WH8064>,

And every plant <WH7880> of the field <WH7704> before <WH2962> it was in the earth <WH776>, and every herb <WH6212> of the field <WH7704> before <WH2962> it grew <WH6779> <WH8799>: for <WH3588> the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> had not <WH3808> caused it to rain <WH4305> <WH8689> upon the earth <WH776>, and there was not <WH369> a man <WH120> to till <WH5647> <WH8800> the ground <WH127>.
But there went up <WH5927> <WH8799> a mist <WH108> from <WH4480> the earth <WH776>, and watered <WH8248> <WH8689> the whole face <WH6440> of the ground <WH127>.

And the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> formed <WH3335> <WH8799> man <WH120> of the dust <WH6083> of <WH4480> the ground <WH127>, and breathed <WH5301> <WH8799> into his nostrils <WH639> the breath <WH5397> of life <WH2416>; and man <WH120> became a living <WH2416> soul <WH5315>.

And the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> planted <WH5193> <WH8799> a garden <WH1588> eastward <WH6924> in Eden <WH5731>; and there <WH8033> he put <WH7760> <WH8799> the man <WH120> whom <WH834> he had formed <WH3335> <WH8804>.

And out <WH4480> of the ground <WH127> made <WH6779> the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> to grow <WH6779> <WH8686> every tree <WH6086> that is pleasant <WH2530> <WH8737> to the sight <WH4758>, and good <WH2896> for food <WH3978>; the tree <WH6086> of life <WH2416> also in the midst <WH8432> of the garden <WH1588>, and the tree <WH6086> of knowledge <WH1847> of good <WH2896> and evil <WH7451>.

And a river <WH5104> went out <WH3318> <WH8802> of Eden <WH5731> to water <WH8248> <WH8687> the garden <WH1588>; and from thence it was parted <WH6504> <WH8735>, and became into four <WH702> heads <WH7218>.
The name <WH8034> of the first <WH259> is Pison <WH6376>: that <WH1931> is it which compasseht <WH5437> <WH8802> the whole land <WH776> of Havilah <WH2341>, where <WH834> there is gold <WH2091>;
And the gold <WH2091> of that <WH1931> land <WH776> is good <WH2896>: there is bdellium <WH916> and the onyx <WH7718> stone <WH68>.
And the name <WH8034> of the second <WH8145> river <WH5104> is Gihon <WH1521>: the same is it that compasseht <WH5437> <WH8802> the whole land <WH776> of Ethiopia <WH3568>.

And the name <WH8034> of the third <WH7992> river <WH5104> is Hiddekel <WH2313>: that is it which goeth toward <WH1980> <WH8802> the east <WH6926> of Ashur <WH804>. And the fourth <WH7243> river <WH5104> is Euphrates <WH6578>.

And the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> took <WH3947> <WH8799> the man <WH120>, and put him <WH3240> <WH8686> into the garden <WH1588> of Eden <WH5731> to dress <WH5647> <WH8800> it and to keep <WH8104> <WH8800> it.

And the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> commanded <WH6680> <WH8762> the man <WH120>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Of every tree <WH6086> of the garden <WH1588> thou mayest freely <WH398> <WH8800> eat <WH398> <WH8799>:

But of the tree <WH6086> of the knowledge <WH1847> of good <WH2896> and evil <WH7451>, thou shalt not eat <WH398> <WH8799> of it: for in the day <WH3117> that thou eatest <WH398> <WH8800> thereof thou shalt surely <WH4191> <WH8800> die <WH4191> <WH8799>.

And the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> said <WH559> <WH8799>, It is not good <WH2896> that the man <WH120> should be <WH1961> <WH8800> alone; I will make <WH6213> <WH8799> him an help meet <WH5828> for him.

And out of the ground <WH127> the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> formed <WH3335> <WH8799> every beast <WH2416> of the field <WH7704>, and every fowl <WH5775> of the air <WH8064>; and brought <WH935> <WH8686> them unto Adam <WH120> to see <WH7200> <WH8800> what he would call <WH7121> <WH8799> them: and whatsoever Adam <WH120> called <WH7121> <WH8799> every living <WH2416> creature <WH5315>, that <WH1931> was the name thereof <WH8034>.

And Adam <WH120> gave <WH7121> <WH8799> names <WH8034> to all cattle <WH929>, and to the fowl <WH5775> of the air <WH8064>, and to every beast <WH2416> of the field <WH7704>; but for Adam <WH120> there was not found <WH4672> <WH8804> an help meet <WH5828> for him.

And the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> caused <WH5307> a deep sleep <WH8639> to fall <WH5307> <WH8686> upon Adam <WH121>, and he slept <WH3462> <WH8799>: and he took <WH3947> <WH8799> one <WH259> of his ribs <WH6763>, and closed up <WH5462> <WH8799> the flesh <WH1320> instead thereof;

And the rib <WH6763>, which the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> had taken <WH3947> <WH8804> from man <WH120>, made <WH1129> <WH8799> he a woman <WH802>, and brought <WH935> <WH8686> her unto the man <WH120>.

And Adam <WH120> said <WH559> <WH8799>, This <WH2063> is now <WH6471> bone <WH6106> of my bones <WH6106>, and flesh <WH1320> of my flesh <WH1320>: she <WH2063> shall be called <WH7121> <WH8735> Woman <WH802>, because she <WH2063> was taken <WH3947> <WH8795> out of Man <WH376>.

Therefore <WH3651> shall a man <WH376> leave <WH5800> <WH8799> his father <WH1> and his mother <WH517>, and shall cleave <WH1692> <WH8804> unto his wife <WH802>: and they shall be one <WH259> flesh <WH1320>.
And they were both <WH8147> naked <WH6174>, the man <WH120> and his wife <WH802>, and were not ashamed <WH954> <WH8709>.
